text:
Lead Mobile Developer | Highrise | Raleigh-Durham, North Carolina | Full Time | ONSITE | http://www.highrisegame.com

Highrise is the leading avatar-based social network on iOS. Every day, over 100,000 people use our application to make friends, keep in touch, decorate avatars and rooms, and chat. We are a lean and profitable team with offices in San Francisco and the American Underground in Raleigh-Durham.

As our first non-founder engineer, you'll jump into a wide array of complex engineering challenges with a focus on developing our Android product and integrating our Unity game engine. You'll be pair programming and working extremely closely with our CTO.

Apply: https://highrise-inc.workable.com/j/0BFFEBC931
